name: Adidas Runners Strength Session
about: Level up your performance with a focused Strength Session at Cult. Designed to build muscle, improve stability, and enhance overall running efficiency, this workout targets key muscle groups runners rely on. Train smarter, get stronger, and stay injury-free – all in a high-energy, coach-led environment.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session & Race Tips
about: Sharpen your speed and race-day strategy in this power-packed session. Push your limits with interval training designed to boost pace and performance, followed by expert race tips covering pacing, mindset, gear, and recovery. Whether you’re eyeing a new Personal Best or your first finish line, this session gets you race-ready.
